name: EbertBattleLupus
_source: s;Ebert;Lupus, I still hold your debt.
s;Ebert;Turn against your employer, and it will be wiped clean!
s;Lupus;Should've made that offer earlier.{w}{br}Pretty sure it'll be cleared after today,{w}{br}one way or another.
s;Lupus;Also, have you met Anuki? She's terrifying.{w}{br}I'm not betraying her.
